name: HttpRequest

constructors.name: HttpRequest
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the HttpRequest class.

methods.name: getBody
methods.description: Retrieves the body of this request.

methods.name: getBodyAsBlob
methods.description: Retrieves the body of this request as a Blob.

methods.name: getBodyDocument
methods.description: Retrieves the body of this request as a DOM document.

methods.name: getCompressed
methods.description: If true, the request body is compressed, false otherwise.

methods.name: getEndpoint
methods.description: Retrieves the URL for the endpoint of the external server for this request.

methods.name: getHeader
methods.description: Retrieves the contents of the request header.

methods.name: getMethod
methods.description: Returns the type of method used by HttpRequest.

methods.name: setBody
methods.description: Sets the contents of the body for this request.

methods.name: setBodyAsBlob
methods.description: Sets the contents of the body for this request using a Blob.

methods.name: setBodyDocument
methods.description: Sets the contents of the body for this request. The contents represent a DOM document.

methods.name: setClientCertificate
methods.signature: public Void setClientCertificate(String clientCert, String password)
methods.description: This method is deprecated. Use setClientCertificateName instead.

methods.name: setClientCertificateName
methods.description: If the external service requires a client certificate for authentication, set the certificate name.

methods.name: setCompressed
methods.description: If true, the data in the body is delivered to the endpoint in the gzip compressed format. If false, no compression format is used.

methods.name: setEndpoint
methods.description: Specifies the endpoint for this request.

params.name: endpoint
params.description: Possible values for the endpoint: Endpoint URLhttps://my_endpoint.example.com/some_path   Named credential URL, which contains the scheme callout, the name of the named credential, and, optionally, an appended pathcallout:My_Named_Credential/some_path

methods.name: setHeader
methods.signature: public Void setHeader(String key, String value)
methods.description: Sets the contents of the request header.

methods.name: setMethod
methods.description: Sets the type of method to be used for the HTTP request.

params.name: method
params.description: Possible values for the method type include: DELETE  GET  HEAD  POST  PUT  TRACE

methods.name: setTimeout
methods.description: Sets the timeout in milliseconds for the request.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string containing the URL for the endpoint of the external server for this request and the method used, for example, Endpoint=http://YourServer, Method=POST

description: Use the HttpRequest class to programmatically create HTTP requests like GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.
